meanings.sent1: She overnourished her plants with too much fertilizer.
meanings.sent2: The mother overnourished her baby with too many snacks.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally overnourished the soup, making it too rich.
meanings.sent4: The overnourishing of the soil led to an abundance of weeds.
meanings.sent5: Overnourishing can sometimes do more harm than good.

meanings.sent1: The overnourishing meal left everyone feeling uncomfortably full.
meanings.sent2: The overnourishing lotion made her skin feel greasy.
meanings.sent3: The overnourishing shampoo made her hair look oily.
meanings.sent4: The overnourishing diet resulted in weight gain.
meanings.sent5: The overnourishing food was delicious but heavy.
